ModMetaData.name: GitUpdater
ModMetaData.author: Jamesthe1
ModMetaData.description:
Automatically updates mods with git repositories, both those in RimWorld's Mods folder as well as ones from the Steam Workshop.
Now with a config menu! This can set whether it should update on startup, what mods can be whitelisted/blacklisted, how conflicts are resolved, and whether or not to prune old branches.
Created using LibGit2Sharp at https://github.com/Jamesthe1/libgit2sharp. GitHub: https://github.com/Jamesthe1/GitUpdater
